name: Flieple Pixel
description:
Controls:

Tap or click to jump to where you clicked!

Hold down the mouse or your finger to allow for a longer jump with different physics!

Version 0.1.4:

- Added some extra animation to the protagonist.
- Added a basic icon to the Windows ZIP.
- Still don't know why the Windows has aliasing, but the HTML5 doesn't.

Premise:

- In a world of bloodshed and monsters, you play as a little bunny monster. Talk to nice monsters, deal with not-so-nice traps, and find out where each portal leads to!
